welcome: Please select a city to continue:
help:
Available commands:
/start - Start the bot
/profile - View profile
/register - Register
/language - Change language
/menu - Show command menu
register: Please register by sharing your contact information
contact_received: Thank you! Your phone number ${phone} has been registered
already_registered: You are already registered with phone number: ${phone}
registration_required: Please register first to use this feature
unknown_command: Sorry, I don't understand this command.
error_occurred: An error occurred. Please try again later.
language_invalid: Please provide a valid language code: en or ru.
bot_restarted: Bot has been restarted. Starting from the beginning...
order_flow_placeholder: Order flow will be implemented here
my_orders_placeholder: My orders will be shown here
cashback_placeholder: Cashback information will be shown here
feedback_placeholder: Feedback form will be shown here
join_team_placeholder: Join our friendly team our friendly team! Click on the button below to fill out the questionnaire right here, without leaving Telegram.

changeName.enter_name: Please enter your first and last name.
changeName.success: Your name has been successfully changed to: ${name}

changeNumber.enter_number: Please send or enter your phone number in the format: +998 ** *** ****
changeNumber.success: Your phone number has been successfully changed to: ${phone}
changeNumber.invalid_format: Invalid number format. Please enter the number in the format: +998 ** *** ****

changeCity.no_cities: Unfortunately, the city list is empty. Please try again later.

branchInfo.select_branch: Please select a branch to view details:
branchInfo.no_branches: No branches found in the selected city.

feedback.text: If you want to write to us or leave a review, we would be happy.
feedback.writeUsText: If you have any questions or suggestions, please contact us.

review.title: ✅ Les Ailes Service control.
review.product_rating: Mahsulot (Product) Please rate the quality of our products:
review.thank_you: Thank you for your review! Your ratings: Product: ${product} ⭐ Service: ${service} ⭐ Delivery: ${delivery} ⭐ We value your feedback and use it to improve our service.
review.please_use_buttons: Please use the buttons to rate.
review.explanation: Thank you for your selection and we would be happy if you rate our work on a 5-point scale.
review.review_completed: Thank you! Your review has been confirmed.
review.can_confirm: Please confirm your ratings or go back.

delivery.text: Where to deliver? Send your location and we determine the nearest branch and delivery cost.
delivery.noAddressFound: You don't have any saved addresses
delivery.locationReceived: Thank you! Your location has been received. Calculating delivery cost...
delivery.addNewAddress: You can share your location to add a new address

pickup.text: Where are you? Send your location and we determine the nearest branch to you
pickup.locationRequest: 📍 Please share your geolocation so we can determine the nearest branch
pickup.locationReceived: Thank you! Your coordinates have been received. Finding the nearest branch...
pickup.processingLocation: Thank you for providing your location! We will contact you to clarify the details of your order.

location.findingBranch: Finding the nearest branch based on your location...
location.confirmLocation: Confirm or send the location again 📍

startOrder.redirecting_to_categories: Great! Now choose a product category:

newOrder.help: Use the buttons to select products
newOrder.orderComplete: Order completed! We'll deliver it soon.
newOrder.select_category: Select a category to view products

error: An error occurred. Please try again.

cart.title: Your Cart
cart.checkout_message: Checkout functionality will be added later
cart.back_message: Use the button below to go back:

categories.title: Product Categories
categories.empty: No categories available at the moment.
categories.not_found: Category not found. Please select from the keyboard.
categories.products_coming_soon: Products for this category will be available soon!

products.title: Products
products.empty: No products available in this category

checkout.title: Checkout
checkout.time_set_nearest: ✅ Great! Your order will be ready in the nearest time.
checkout.use_buttons: Please use the buttons to select the time.
checkout.delivery_note: Delivery cost is not included in the order total
checkout.empty_cart: Your cart is empty. Add products before checking out.
checkout.error_completing_order: Error completing order. Please try again.
checkout.additional_phone_request:
Please enter your additional phone number, we can call you.
+998 ** *** ****
checkout.cutlery_question: Add appliances and wipes to your order?
checkout.error_creating_order: An error occurred while creating the order. Please try again.

auth.welcome_message: Authorization is required to continue using the bot.
auth.instructions:
You can:
• Press "Share Contact" button for quick authorization
• Or enter your phone number manually in format: +998XXXXXXXXX
auth.uzbek_only: ⚠️ Only Uzbek phone numbers are accepted (+998)
auth.uzbek_phone_required: Please use an Uzbek phone number.
auth.enter_phone_manual: Please enter a valid Uzbek phone number or press "Share Contact" button.
auth.otp_network_error: ❌ An error occurred while sending SMS. Please try later.
auth.otp_invalid_format: ❌ Code must consist of 6 digits. Please try again.
auth.otp_verification_error:
❌ ${error}

Please try again or request a new code.
auth.otp_verification_network_error: ❌ An error occurred while verifying the code. Please try later.
auth.phone_not_found: ❌ Phone number not found. Start authorization again.
auth.wait_before_resend: ⏳ Please wait ${seconds} seconds before resending the code.
auth.otp_limit_exceeded: Attempt limit exceeded. Please try again in ${minutes} minutes.
auth.authorization_required: Authorization is required to access this feature.
